name: Fish Tacos in Lettuce "Shells"
author: SlimCookins
summary: Baked tilapia, flaked and placed in romaine lettuce leaves with tomatoes, cilantro, and avocado salsa verde.
ingredients: ½  avocado - peeled, pitted and diced
½  jalapeno pepper, seeded and minced
directions: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Combine Cajun seasoning, chili powder, paprika, garlic salt, and ground black pepper in a bowl
Sprinkle on each side of tilapia fillets, covering evenly; cover each side with lemon juice
Place fillets on a baking sheet
Bake in the preheated oven until cooked through, 8 to 10 minutes
Shred tilapia; place equal portions in each romaine leaf
Blend avocado, onion, jalapeno pepper, garlic, and water together in a blender to make the avocado salsa verde
Top prepared tacos with salsa verde and cherry tomatoes
